[doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTMotionEstimationSessionCreate] takes a dictionary of creation options, `motionVectorProcessorSelectionOptions`. # kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_Label

**Global Variable**

A label you use to log and track resources.

## Declaration

```swift
let kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_Label: CFString!
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/VTMotionEstimationSessionCreate] takes a dictionary of creation options, `motionVectorProcessorSelectionOptions`. You can supply [doc://com.apple.videotoolbox/documentation/VideoToolbox/kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_Label] with `CFString` to specify a label used in logging and resource tracking.
title: kVTMotionEstimationSessionCreationOption_Label
